paper_abstract: Planar PCB inductors, being printed directly on the PCB board, are employed in various electronic systems. The resistance and inductance of a square PCB inductor are calculated in this paper. For this a multiconductor transmission-line model is constructed and its coupling integral equations are given. These equations are solved by wavelet-MoM, in which a [0, 1] Coifman intervallic scarlet is used. Finally, the inductance and resistance versus frequency plots are presented.
paper_title: PCB INDUCTOR IMPEDANCE CALCULATION BASED ON WAVELET-MoM
